   16: -module(connect_SUITE).
   17: 
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   27: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   28:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   29:      || (E) =/= (V)])).
   30: -define(SECURE_USER, secure_joe).
   31: -define(CERT_FILE, "priv/ssl/fake_server.pem").
   32: -define(TLS_VERSIONS, ["tlsv1", "tlsv1.1", "tlsv1.2"]).
   33: 
   34: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   35: %% Suite configuration
   36: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   37: 
   38: all() ->
   39:     AuthMods = mongoose_helper:auth_modules(),
   40:     case lists:member(ejabberd_auth_external, AuthMods) of
   41:         true ->
   42:             {skip, "Conf reload doesn't work correctly with sample external auth"};
   43:         _ ->
   44:             [{group, c2s_noproc}, %% should be first, uses vanilla config
   45:              {group, negative},
   46:              {group, pre_xmpp_1_0},
   47:              {group, starttls},
   48:              {group, feature_order},
   49:              {group, tls},
   50:              {group, ciphers_default},
   51:              {group, 'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'}]
   52:     end.
   53: 
   54: groups() ->
   55:     [{c2s_noproc, [], [reset_stream_noproc,
   56:                        starttls_noproc,
   57:                        compress_noproc]},
   58:      {negative, [], [bad_xml,
   59:                      invalid_host,
   60:                      invalid_stream_namespace]},
   61:      {pre_xmpp_1_0, [], [pre_xmpp_1_0_stream]},
   62:      {starttls, test_cases()},
   63:      {feature_order, [stream_features_test,
   64:                       tls_authenticate,
   65:                       tls_compression_fail,
   66:                       tls_compression_authenticate_fail,
   67:                       tls_authenticate_compression,
   68:                       auth_compression_bind_session,
   69:                       auth_bind_compression_session]},
   70:      {tls, generate_tls_vsn_tests()},
   71:      {ciphers_default, [], [clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers,
   72:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA',
   73:                             'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA']},
   74:      {'node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', [],
   75:       %% node2 accepts DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA exclusively (see ejabberd.cfg)
   76:       ['clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only']}].
   77: 
   78: test_cases() ->
   79:     generate_tls_vsn_tests() ++
   80:     [should_fail_with_sslv3,
   81:      should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls,
   82:      should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required].
   83: 
   84: suite() ->
   85:     escalus:suite().
   86: 
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %% Init & teardown
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: 
   91: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   92:     Config0 = escalus:init_per_suite([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd, []}} | Config]),
   93:     Config1 = ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config0),
   94:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Config1),
   95:     assert_cert_file_exists(),
   96:     escalus:create_users(Config1, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])).
   97: 
   98: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   99:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([?SECURE_USER, alice])),
  100:     restore_ejabberd_node(Config),
  101:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  102: 
  103: init_per_group(c2s_noproc, Config) ->
  104:     Config;
  105: init_per_group(starttls, Config) ->
  106:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config,
  107:                              fun mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern/0),
  108:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  109:     Config;
  110: init_per_group(tls, Config) ->
  111:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  112:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  113:     Users = proplists:get_value(escalus_users, Config, []),
  114:     JoeSpec = lists:keydelete(starttls, 1, proplists:get_value(?SECURE_USER, Users)),
  115:     JoeSpec2 = {?SECURE_USER, lists:keystore(ssl, 1, JoeSpec, {ssl, true})},
  116:     NewUsers = lists:keystore(?SECURE_USER, 1, Users, JoeSpec2),
  117:     lists:keystore(escalus_users, 1, Config, {escalus_users, NewUsers});
  118: init_per_group(feature_order, Config) ->
  119:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_compression_config_pattern/0),
  120:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  121:     Config;
  122: init_per_group(ciphers_default, Config) ->
  123:     config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, fun mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern/0),
  124:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd),
  125:     [{c2s_port, 5222} | Config];
  126: init_per_group('node2_supports_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only', Config) ->
  127:     [{c2s_port, 5233} | Config];
  128: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  129:     Config.
  130: 
  131: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  132:     Config.
  133: 
  134: generate_tls_vsn_tests() ->
  135:     [list_to_existing_atom("should_pass_with_" ++ VSN)
  136:      || VSN <- ?TLS_VERSIONS].
  137: 
  138: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  139: %% Tests
  140: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  141: 
  142: bad_xml(Config) ->
  143:     %% given
  144:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  145:     %% when
  146:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_bad_xml(Spec),
  147:     %% then
  148:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  149:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  150:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  151:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"xml-not-well-formed">>, <<>>], Error),
  152:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  153: 
  154: invalid_host(Config) ->
  155:     %% given
  156:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  157:     %% when
  158:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_to_invalid_host(Spec),
  159:     %% then
  160:     %% See RFC 6120 4.9.1.3 (http://xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc6120.html#streams-error-rules-host).
  161:     %% Stream start from the server is required in this case.
  162:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  163:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"host-unknown">>, <<>>], Error),
  164:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  165: 
  166: invalid_stream_namespace(Config) ->
  167:     %% given
  168:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  169:     %% when
  170:     [Start, Error, End] = connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec),
  171:     %% then
  172:     escalus:assert(is_stream_start, Start),
  173:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"invalid-namespace">>, <<>>], Error),
  174:     escalus:assert(is_stream_end, End).
  175: 
  176: pre_xmpp_1_0_stream(Config) ->
  177:     %% given
  178:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  179:     Steps = [
  180:              %% when
  181:              {legacy_stream_helper, start_stream_pre_xmpp_1_0},
  182:              {legacy_stream_helper, failed_legacy_auth}
  183:             ],
  184:     %% ok, now do the plan from above
  185:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, Steps),
  186:     escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  187: 
  188: should_fail_with_sslv3(Config) ->
  189:     %% GIVEN
  190:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  191:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, sslv3),
  192:     %% WHEN
  193:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1) of
  194:     %% THEN
  195:         _ ->
  196:             error(client_connected_using_sslv3)
  197:     catch
  198:         error:closed ->
  199:             ok
  200:     end.
  201: 
  202: should_pass_with_tlsv1(Config) ->
  203:     should_pass_with_tls(tlsv1, Config).
  204: 
  205: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.1'(Config) ->
  206:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.1', Config).
  207: 
  208: 'should_pass_with_tlsv1.2'(Config) ->
  209:     should_pass_with_tls('tlsv1.2', Config).
  210: 
  211: should_pass_with_tls(Version, Config)->
  212:     UserSpec0 = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  213:     UserSpec1 = set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec0, Version),
  214: 
  215:     %% WHEN
  216:     Result = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec1),
  217: 
  218:     %% THEN
  219:     ?assertMatch({ok, _, _, _}, Result).
  220: 
  221: should_fail_to_authenticate_without_starttls(Config) ->
  222:     %% GIVEN
  223:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  224:     {Conn, Props, Features} = start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec),
  225: 
  226:     %% WHEN
  227:     try escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props, Features) of
  228:     %% THEN
  229:         _ ->
  230:             error(authentication_without_tls_suceeded)
  231:     catch
  232:         throw:{auth_failed, User, AuthReply} ->
  233:             ?assertEqual(atom_to_binary(?SECURE_USER, utf8), User),
  234:             escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>,
  235:                                              <<"Use of STARTTLS required">>],
  236:                            AuthReply)
  237:     end.
  238: 
  239: should_not_send_other_features_with_starttls_required(Config) ->
  240:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  241:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, [start_stream]),
  242:     Features = case escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, wait_for_features) of
  243:         #xmlel{name = <<"stream:features">>, children = Children} -> Children;
  244:         #xmlel{name = <<"features">>, children = Children} -> Children
  245:     end,
  246:     ?assertMatch([#xmlel{name = <<"starttls">>,
  247:                          children = [#xmlel{name = <<"required">>}]}],
  248:                  Features).
  249: 
  250: clients_can_connect_with_advertised_ciphers(Config) ->
  251:     ?assert(length(ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)) > 0).
  252: 
  253: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA'(Config) ->
  254:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA",
  255:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  256: 
  257: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA_only'(Config) ->
  258:     ?assertEqual(["DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA"],
  259:                  ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config)).
  260: 
  261: 'clients_can_connect_with_DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA'(Config) ->
  262:     ?assert(lists:member("DHE-RSA-AES128-SHA",
  263:                          ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config))).
  264: 
  265: 
  266: reset_stream_noproc(Config) ->
  267:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  268:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  269:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  270:                end,
  271:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  272:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  273: 
  274:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  275:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  276:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  277:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  278:     %% Add auth element into message queue of the c2s process
  279:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  280:     ?assertThrow({timeout, auth_reply}, escalus_session:authenticate(Conn, Props)),
  281:     %% Sim client disconnection
  282:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  283:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  284:     %% Resume
  285:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  286:     receive
  287:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  288:             ok;
  289:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  290:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  291:         after 5000 ->
  292:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  293:     end,
  294:     ok.
  295: 
  296: starttls_noproc(Config) ->
  297:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  298:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  299:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  300:                end,
  301:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  302:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  303: 
  304:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  305:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  306:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  307:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  308:     %% Add starttls element into message queue of the c2s process
  309:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  310:     ?assertThrow({timeout, proceed}, escalus_session:starttls(Conn, Props)),
  311:     %% Sim client disconnection
  312:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  313:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  314:     %% Resume
  315:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  316:     receive
  317:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  318:             ok;
  319:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  320:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  321:         after 5000 ->
  322:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  323:     end,
  324:     ok.
  325: 
  326: compress_noproc(Config) ->
  327:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, alice),
  328:     PreAuthF = fun(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  329:                        {Conn, Props, Features}
  330:                end,
  331:     Steps = [start_stream, stream_features],
  332:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, Steps),
  333: 
  334:     [C2sPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_c2s_sup])),
  335:     [RcvPid] = children_specs_to_pids(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_receiver_sup])),
  336:     MonRef = erlang:monitor(process, C2sPid),
  337:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, suspend, [C2sPid]),
  338:     %% Add compress element into message queue of the c2s process
  339:     %% There is no reply because the process is suspended
  340:     ?assertThrow({timeout, compressed},
  341:                  escalus_session:compress(Conn, [{compression, <<"zlib">>}|Props])),
  342:     %% Sim client disconnection
  343:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_receiver, close, [RcvPid]),
  344:     %% ...c2s process receives close and DOWN messages...
  345:     %% Resume
  346:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, resume, [C2sPid]),
  347:     receive
  348:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, normal} ->
  349:             ok;
  350:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, C2sPid, Reason} ->
  351:             ct:fail("ejabberd_c2s exited with reason ~p", [Reason])
  352:         after 5000 ->
  353:             ct:fail("c2s_monitor_timeout", [])
  354:     end,
  355:     ok.
  356: 
  357: %% Tests featuress advertisement
  358: stream_features_test(Config) ->
  359:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  360:     List = [start_stream, stream_features, {?MODULE, verify_features}],
  361:     escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, List),
  362:     ok.
  363: 
  364: verify_features(Conn, Props, Features) ->
  365:     %% should not advertise compression before tls
  366:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(compression, Features)),
  367:     %% start tls. Starttls should be then removed from list and compression should be added
  368:     {Conn1, Props1} = escalus_session:starttls(Conn, Props),
  369:     {Conn2, Props2, Features2} = escalus_session:stream_features(Conn1, Props1, []),
  370:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(starttls, Features2)),
  371:     ?assert(false =/= has_feature(compression, Features2)),
  372:     %% start compression. Compression should be then removed from list
  373:     {Conn3, Props3} = escalus_session:compress(Conn2, Props2),
  374:     {Conn4, Props4, Features4} = escalus_session:stream_features(Conn3, Props3, []),
  375:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(compression, Features4)),
  376:     ?assert_equal(false, has_feature(starttls, Features4)),
  377:     %%
  378:     escalus_session:authenticate(Conn4, Props4, Features4).
  379: 
  380: has_feature(Feature, FeatureList) ->
  381:     {_, Value} = lists:keyfind(Feature, 1, FeatureList),
  382:     Value.
  383: 
  384: %% should fail
  385: tls_compression_authenticate_fail(Config) ->
  386:     %% Given
  387:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  388:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, maybe_use_compression, authenticate],
  389:     %% when and then
  390:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps) of
  391:         _ ->
  392:             error(compression_without_auth_suceeded)
  393:     catch
  394:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_compressed, Stanza, _} ->
  395:             case Stanza of
  396:                 #xmlel{name = <<"failure">>} ->
  397:                     ok;
  398:                 _ ->
  399:                     error(unknown_compression_response)
  400:             end
  401:     end.
  402: 
  403: tls_authenticate_compression(Config) ->
  404:     %% Given
  405:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  406:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, authenticate, maybe_use_compression],
  407:     %% then
  408:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  409:     % when and then
  410:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  411:     SSL = Conn#client.ssl,
  412:     ?assert(false =/= Compress),
  413:     ?assert(false =/= SSL).
  414: 
  415: tls_authenticate(Config) ->
  416:     %% Given
  417:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  418:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, authenticate],
  419:     %% then
  420:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  421:     % when,
  422:     SSL = Conn#client.ssl,
  423:     ?assert(false =/= SSL).
  424: 
  425: %% should fail
  426: tls_compression_fail(Config) ->
  427:     %% Given
  428:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  429:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl, maybe_use_compression],
  430:     %% then and when
  431:     try escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps) of
  432:         _ ->
  433:             error(compression_without_auth_suceeded)
  434:     catch
  435:         error:{assertion_failed, assert, is_compressed, Stanza, _} ->
  436:             case Stanza of
  437:                 #xmlel{name = <<"failure">>} ->
  438:                     ok;
  439:                 _ ->
  440:                     error(unknown_compression_response)
  441:             end
  442:     end.
  443: 
  444: auth_compression_bind_session(Config) ->
  445:     %% Given
  446:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  447:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl,
  448:         authenticate, maybe_use_compression, bind, session],
  449:     %% then
  450:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  451:     % when
  452:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  453:     ?assert(false =/= Compress).
  454: 
  455: auth_bind_compression_session(Config) ->
  456:     %% Given
  457:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, ?SECURE_USER),
  458:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_ssl,
  459:         authenticate, bind, maybe_use_compression, session],
  460:     %% then
  461:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec, ConnetctionSteps),
  462:     % when
  463:     Compress = Conn#client.compress,
  464:     ?assert(false =/= Compress).
  465: 
  466: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  467: %% Internal functions
  468: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  469: 
  470: c2s_port(Config) ->
  471:     case ?config(c2s_port, Config) of
  472:         undefined -> 5223;
  473:         Value -> Value
  474:     end.
  475: 
  476: ciphers_available_in_os() ->
  477:     CiphersStr = os:cmd("openssl ciphers 'ALL:eNULL'"),
  478:     [string:strip(C, both, $\n) || C <- string:tokens(CiphersStr, ":")].
  479: 
  480: ciphers_working_with_ssl_clients(Config) ->
  481:     Port = c2s_port(Config),
  482:     lists:filter(fun(Cipher) ->
  483:                          openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port)
  484:                  end, ciphers_available_in_os()).
  485: 
  486: openssl_client_can_use_cipher(Cipher, Port) ->
  487:     PortStr = integer_to_list(Port),
  488:     Cmd = "echo '' | openssl s_client -connect localhost:" ++ PortStr ++
  489:         " -cipher " "\"" ++ Cipher ++ "\" 2>&1"
  490:         " | grep 'Cipher is " ++ Cipher ++ "'",
  491:     [] =/= os:cmd(Cmd).
  492: 
  493: restore_ejabberd_node(Config) ->
  494:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Config),
  495:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd).
  496: 
  497: assert_cert_file_exists() ->
  498:     ejabberd_node_utils:file_exists(?CERT_FILE) orelse
  499:         ct:fail("cert file ~s not exists", [?CERT_FILE]).
  500: 
  501: config_ejabberd_node_tls(Config, Fun) ->
  502:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file([Fun()], Config).
  503: 
  504: mk_value_for_tls_config_pattern() ->
  505:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, tls,"}.
  506: 
  507: mk_value_for_compression_config_pattern() ->
  508:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,  {zlib, 10000},"}.
  509: 
  510: mk_value_for_starttls_required_config_pattern() ->
  511:     {tls_config, "{certfile, \"" ++ ?CERT_FILE ++ "\"}, starttls_required,"}.
  512: 
  513: set_secure_connection_protocol(UserSpec, Version) ->
  514:     [{ssl_opts, [{versions, [Version]}]} | UserSpec].
  515: 
  516: start_stream_with_compression(UserSpec) ->
  517:     ConnetctionSteps = [start_stream, stream_features, maybe_use_compression],
  518:     {ok, Conn, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec,
  519:                                                             ConnetctionSteps),
  520:     {Conn, Props, Features}.
  521: 
  522: connect_to_invalid_host(Spec) ->
  523:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_to_invalid_host}]),
  524:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  525: 
  526: connect_to_invalid_host(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  527:     escalus:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:stream_start(<<"hopefullynonexistentdomain">>,
  528:                                                    ?NS_JABBER_CLIENT)),
  529:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  530: 
  531: connect_with_bad_xml(Spec) ->
  532:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [{?MODULE, connect_with_bad_xml}]),
  533:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  534: 
  535: connect_with_bad_xml(Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  536:     escalus_connection:send(Conn, #xmlcdata{content = "asdf\n"}),
  537:     {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}.
  538: 
  539: connect_with_invalid_stream_namespace(Spec) ->
  540:     F = fun (Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures) ->
  541:                 Start = stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(escalus_users:get_server([], Spec)),
  542:                 escalus:send(Conn, Start),
  543:                 {Conn, UnusedProps, UnusedFeatures}
  544:         end,
  545:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec, [F]),
  546:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Conn, 3).
  547: 
  548: stream_start_invalid_stream_ns(To) ->
  549:     legacy_stream_helper:stream_start(lists:keystore(stream_ns, 1, default_context(To),
  550:                                 {stream_ns, <<"obviously-invalid-namespace">>})).
  551: 
  552: default_context(To) ->
  553:     [{version, <<"version='1.0'">>},
  554:      {to, To},
  555:      {stream_ns, ?NS_XMPP}].
  556: 
  557: node2_rpccall(Module, Function, Args) ->
  558:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
  559:     rpc:call(Node, Module, Function, Args).
  560: 
  561: children_specs_to_pids(Children) ->
  562:     [Pid || {_, Pid, _, _} <- Children].
